name: Effect of registration for enforcement
text:
(a)  A support order or income withholding order issued in another state is registered when the order is filed in a tribunal of this State.
	(b)  A registered order issued in another state is enforceable in the same manner and is subject to the same procedures as an order issued by a tribunal of this State.
	(c)  Except as otherwise provided in this article, a tribunal of this State shall recognize and enforce, but may not modify, a registered order if the issuing tribunal had jurisdiction. [L 1997, c 295, pt of §1]
